title: 1965 RHD ex CP 11 window AUTO now SOLD.

posts.content:
As per title.

Currently motd

Bodywork overall is good. Full length aftermarket sunroof. Requires usual repairs here and there. I.e. bottom of doors. Engine bay has had new corners and side trays. New rear valance. 2 x Popouts.

Engine is a rebuilt 2.0 type 4 with 911 fan conversion. Twin 36 idfs rebuilt and cleaned. Full oil flow/cooler and breather. New electronic ignition throughout. 70 Mph all day long if you wish.

Gearbox is a VW 003 auto. Fully working 3 speed. Gearstick is homemade. Waiting on a type 2 or 25 stick.

Steering is stock and has play. Requires refurb/replace.

IRS to the rear

Brakes narrow 5 discs at front. Narrow 5 drums at rear.
5 x 112.

This has been a rolling resto for me and the auto was for my needs. I just dont have the time.

Â£17995 ono

Contact for myself is 07768208654
Regards
Daz
